creatures.name: Dragon
creatures.blurb: The dragon is a majestic beast with a strong and scaley hide. It fears nothing and can breathe fire.

creatures.name: Medusa
creatures.blurb: To look Medusa in the eyes will mean a lifetime in stone. She is a fierce opponent to the terror destroying the world.

creatures.name: 50 Centaur
creatures.blurb: 50 Centaur will take his opponents to the candy shop. 'nuf said.

creatures.name: Griffin
creatures.blurb: The Griffin is fearsome and enjoys long paddles in the pond on his day off. Easily distracted by breadcrumbs, they are its Kryptonite

creatures.name: Horsnake
creatures.blurb: Horsnake's skin repels liquid and often moves around on its slippery back using its legs instead to fight foes

creatures.name: Tigger
creatures.blurb: A tigger's mane is extremely strong and it is able to  whip and nae nae both in dance battles and in the battle field

creatures.name: Hurdle
creatures.blurb: A hurdle's shell protects it from all damage, its weight, however, means Hurdle lacks athletic skill

creatures.name: Angel
creatures.blurb: Angel is one of a kind. What he lacks in skill, he makes up for in sex appeal. One to watch.

creatures.name: Uncle Frank
creatures.blurb: Uncle Frank is your typical creepy uncle, his snide remarks about that cute outfit will surely make his enemies turn and run

creatures.name: Botched
creatures.blurb: A trip to the surgeon gone wrong, Botched's whiskers are made of steel proving to be almost as deadly as its looks

creatures.name: Tird
creatures.blurb: Tird's call is one of pure relief. Come within earshot and you are likely to relieve yourself right there and then.

creatures.name: Birdle
creatures.blurb: He may look cute, but wait until he comes out of his shell.

creatures.name: Shelly
creatures.blurb: Shelly is smelly and likes long walks on the beach, but if you meet him in battle you're likely to see his ferocious underbelly

creatures.name: Snartle
creatures.blurb: Snartle's long neck allows it to see around corners and into cravasses. In battle it uses it like a giraffe wacking its opponents

creatures.name: Snigger
creatures.blurb: The most fearsome of beasts on the battle field, you have chosen well. Snigger's only weakness is cuddles
